content: work k1 p1 rib stitches for 26 28 30 31 33 34 36 row bind off all stitches in pattern tip use needle 1 or 2 size s larger for elastic edge sleeves plain with no tapering place one arm stitches onto to larger dpns pick up 1 2 3 4 4 6 6 stitch es from underarm sm to mark the beginning of round pick up 1 2 3 4 4 6 6 stitch es k in round until you have 79 84 89 94 100 102 108 row from underarm continue to sleeves edging sleeves with tapering place one arm stitches onto to larger dpns pick up 1 2 3 4 4 6 6 stitch es from underarm 4 www soknit com © shhstudios llc sm to mark the beginning of round pick up 1 2 3 4 4 6 6 stitch es *k in round 13 row k1 k2tog k to 3 stitches before the end of round ssk k1 * repeat between ** 4 5 5 5 6 6 6 more times k in round 9 0 5 11 2 4 10 more row continue to sleeves edging sleeves edging switch to smaller dpns work k1 p1 rib stitches for 26 28 30 31 33 34 36 row bind off all stitches in pattern tip use needle 1 or 2 size s larger for elastic edge do the same for the other arm neck finishing pick up an even number of stitches around the neck with smaller needles work k1 p1 rib stitches for 7 7 7 8 8 9 9 row bind off all stitches in pattern tip use needle 1 or 2 size s larger for elastic edge weave in all ends block and show off 5 www soknit com © shhstudios llc this pattern is based on one of the designs made using a mobile app raglanify if you re interested in a customized raglan sweater pattern according to your measurements check out www raglanify com if you find any errors in the pattern please email at contact@soknit com www soknit com © shhstudios llc
